item.description:
We are finally going to go to Miya's. And, if that is not novel enough, we are going on a weekday!

Come to this revolutionary event...different day, different time (7:00 pm!), and very different sushi.

http://www.miyassushi...

a brief sample of what you may find...

oo la la mitzvah! roll
winner of the prestigious 2008 l'chayim world sushi award; this award winning roll was developed by rabbis [of the lost tribe of china] as a gift to the israeli national ping pong team in support of their quest for an olympic medal. Tempura wild pacific king salmon, brie cheese, avocado & ch'i energy
5 pieces/6.75

romping with the goats roll
tempura tilapia, papaya, goat cheese & homemade african berbere mix
5 pieces/5.75

group.name: New Haven County Sushi Meetup Group

item.name: Could it me MIYA's?
